findings.title: setApprovalForAll() function does not function as intended
findings.description: The function reverts the approval transactions due to require statements.

findings.title: SIGH Boosters can be bought at zero price
findings.description: Anyone can purchase a Booster before its price is updated by admin.

findings.title: The onERC721Received() function is open for anyone to call anytime
findings.description: Anyone can call the function with any tokenId, preventing actual owners from selling their tokens.

findings.title: Failing test case for updateDiscountMultiplier() function
findings.description: No logic is present to revert the transaction on zero input.

findings.title: Incorrect require statement in getTokenBalance()
findings.description: The function checks tokenAcceptedAsPayment instead of token variable.

findings.title: Redundant check in safeTransferFrom() function
findings.description: A redundant require statement is present at Line 247 and 252.

findings.title: Spelling mistake in the developerâ€™s comment
findings.description: The comment spells By instead of Buy.

findings.title: Funds collected via Booster sale are not transferred to the Booster seller
findings.description: Funds remain inside the SIGHBoostersSale contract until claimed by admin.
